title: @Riot are you guys working on the skt skins?

replies.body: OMG A RIOT MEMBER REPLIED TO ME!!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Teemo or Feedmo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=bPMVvEax,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-12-23T00:18:04.034+0000)
>
> OMG A RIOT MEMBER REPLIED TO ME!!!!!!!

When it comes to Skins, I do my best to answer where I can. A lot of the time I really can't talk about upcoming projects though so I feel like it's better not to give an unsatisfying response (eg. Necromancer Azir where? I knew we were working on it but couldn't share that information in case we had to cancel or radically change the project). Considering your question was pretty straightforward though I thought I may as well.

In general I can more easily talk about either past Skins or general Skin design stuff >:)

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=bPMVvEax,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-12-23T02:53:14.572+0000)
> 
> In general I can more easily talk about either past Skins or general Skin design stuff >:)

Alright... challenge accepted.

Before Yorick was put on the "no new skins until rework" list (a policy I find quite tiresome since it's been broken several times already), he was already released for an entire year.

What _**really**_ stopped the skins team (or the entire company for that matter) from making and releasing a skin for him in that entire year (or 12 months... or 52 weeks... 365.25  days, or 8766 hours, if you will)?

If I had to guess, it would be for the same reason {{champion:121}} hasn't gotten many skins. So many things to change...

He has 3 different ghosts, particles, ect...

It's a lot to do.
Can you reveal whether there'll be anything special for them due to 2x, or whether they'll be pretty much just the same as the normal championship skins?

> [{quoted}](name=Saixos,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=bPMVvEax,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-13T00:14:36.162+0000)
>
> Can you reveal whether there'll be anything special for them due to 2x, or whether they'll be pretty much just the same as the normal championship skins?

Sorry that i can't answer right now.
Can you tell us if Faker and Easyhoon both get skins or if there's only one skin between them?
kindlejack please tell me taric will get a ruthless taric skin (see panth) along side his rework, he need to show the ladies the magic of those gems
Once his rework ships we will be able to design new skins for him, which I'm really looking forward to!
Does anyone know which characters it'll be?

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=bPMVvEax,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-12T23:13:26.604+0000)
>
> Does anyone know which characters it'll be?

90% Sure that Fiora is going to get one. Marin spammed the shit out of Fiora, also Renekton, so if not her, then its probably him.
I'd say that they have probably started doing some concept work by now, at the very least. :P.
